body:

[E 10:41:26.699 NotebookApp] 500 GET /api/contents/downloads/nbs/lesson1.ipynb?type=notebook&_=1506267686739 (::1) 46.16ms referer=http://localhost:9999/notebooks/downloads/nbs/lesson1.ipynb

I fixed it. I had multiple issues, since I was accessing the server remotely from my client, I had my ssh pointing to the incorrect port on which nbs was running. I fixed that and after that I had permission issues and once I fixed it, I was able to open files.
Thanks
